archimate:Requirement.name: PA.2.2.4a: a) maintain approved apps in a private enterprise app store (e.g. a custom portal that offers a catalogue of apps for download or a secure gateway to approved public app stores)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
